headline: Otter Tail Corporation Appoints Chris Clark and Steve Rasche to Board of Directors
summary: FERGUS FALLS, Minn., December 18, 2025--Otter Tail Corporation has appointed Mr. Chris Clark of Minnetonka, Minnesota, and Mr. Steve Rasche of St. Louis, Missouri, to the company’s Board of Directors, effective January 1, 2026.

headline: Evercore Sticks With Bullish Call on Fermi Inc. (FRMI)
summary: Fermi Inc. (NASDAQ:FRMI) is among the best NASDAQ stocks under $10 to buy. On December 15, Nicholas Amicucci, an analyst at Evercore ISI, reaffirmed a ‘Buy’ rating on Fermi Inc. (NASDAQ:FRMI), with an unchanged price target of $20, which reflects an upside potential of roughly 133% from the current price. Earlier on December 5, Fermi […]

headline: Xcel Energy (XEL) Valuation Check as Texas Wildfire Lawsuit and Bond Tender Reshape Investor Expectations
summary: The latest move in Xcel Energy (XEL) stock comes as investors juggle two big developments: a high-profile Texas wildfire lawsuit that raises liability questions, and a $345 million bond tender aimed at tightening the balance sheet. See our latest analysis for Xcel Energy. At around $73.14, Xcel’s 1 month share price return of minus 9.7 percent shows investors repricing wildfire and legal risk, even though the year to date share price return of 9.4 percent and 1 year total shareholder return...
